name: Cream for Cone
description:
Cream For Cone is a Platformer Game made for Ice Cream Jam.

Theme was similar to name of this jam.
You are as an empty Wafer Cone in this Game, and you have to find the Ice Cream Machine to fill your cone with Cream.

Use Arrow Keys for movement.

Space key for jumps (You can also Double Jump).

A Level Editor From Coding With Russ was used in this.

Other than that All Game Art, Music and Programming is by me.
